clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in depression and huntington s disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: LAX 101 a novel and proprietary compound that inhibits certain harmful enzymes including phospholipases and caspases represents a new class of drugs sometimes referred to as NPLs This class may function as neuroprotectants and appears to inhibit degradation of brain tissue by a variety of proposed mechanisms including stabilization of the phospholipid components of cell membranes and mitochondria cell structures that are important in cell regulation and brain function
